title: Respond to a property possession claim online
description:
There’s no fee to respond to a claim. You must respond within 14 days of receiving the claim pack in the post.

This service is also available in Welsh (Cymraeg).
saveDraftInfo: You can save your response as a draft and return to it later. You’ll be able to review and edit your answers before you submit them.
uploadDocumentsInfo: After you finish answering the questions, you can upload any documents to support your response.
claimantVisibilityInfo: The claimant will be able to see any documents you upload and your answers.
provideDetailsInfo: You’ll be asked to provide or confirm details, such as:
listItemDependants: any dependants (people you look after financially)
listItemCircumstances: your circumstances and any exceptional hardship you’d experience if you had to leave your home
shareDetailsInfo: You can also share details about:
financialSituationInfo: You do not have to answer questions about your financial situation, but sharing this information can help a judge understand your circumstances.
hmctsSupportInfo: If you need support to use HMCTS services, like step-free access to a court for your hearing, you can either request this as part of your response, or at a later time.
